Title: Bengaluru’s tomato varieties get researchers national award
Content: Bengaluru’s very own high-yielding tomato varieties of Arka Rakshak and Arka Samrat have helped their researchers bag a prestigious national award.A team of horticultural scientists from the Hessargh
Author: B. S. Satish Kumar
